critique: The executive order seems to want to convey a sense of fear and sadness due to the state of war. It also wants to convey a sense of surprise because of the new rules. Disgust and joy are not emotions the order is trying to convey. The initial scores are fear: 7, sadness: 5, surprise: 3, disgust: 1, joy: 1. After further consideration, the order seems to want to convey more fear and sadness and less surprise. The revised scores are fear: 8, sadness: 6, surprise: 2, disgust: 1, joy: 1.
